ColorShapeLinks AI
An AI competition for the IEEE Conference on Games
ConsoleApp/ColorShapeLinks/TextBased/Lib/MatchController.cs
1 
9 using System;
10 using System.Collections.Generic;
11 using System.Threading;
12 using System.Threading.Tasks;
13 using ColorShapeLinks.Common;
14 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI;
15 using ColorShapeLinks.Common.Session;
16 
17 namespace ColorShapeLinks.TextBased.Lib
18 {
22  public class MatchController : IMatchSubject
23  {
24  // Maximum time a thinker has to think
25  private readonly int timeLimitMillis;
26 
27  // Minimum apparent time a thinker will take to think
28  private readonly int minMoveTimeMillis;
29 
30  // Match configuration
31  private readonly IMatchConfig matchConfig;
32 
33  // Match data
34  private readonly IMatchDataProvider matchData;
35 
36  // A cancellation token so thinker threads can be ordered to stop
37  private readonly CancellationTokenSource ts;
38 
39  // A reference to the game board
40  private readonly Board board;
41 
42  // An array containing the solution, if the game doesn't end in a draw
43  // or an invalid move is made
44  private Pos[] solution;
45 
51  public MatchController(
52  IMatchConfig matchConfig, IMatchDataProvider matchData)
53  {
54  // Keep a reference to the match config
55  this.matchConfig = matchConfig;
56 
57  // Keep a reference to the match data
58  this.matchData = matchData;
59 
60  // Initialize the solution array
61  solution = new Pos[matchConfig.WinSequence];
62 
63  // Initialize the cancellation token
64  ts = new CancellationTokenSource();
65 
66  // Get a reference to the game board
67  board = matchData.Board;
68 
69  // Fetch times from match options
70  timeLimitMillis = matchConfig.TimeLimitMillis;
71  minMoveTimeMillis = matchConfig.MinMoveTimeMillis;
72  }
73 
78  public Winner Run()
79  {
80  // Initially there's no winner
81  Winner winner = Winner.None;
82 
83  // Notify listeners match is about to start
84  MatchStart?.Invoke(
85  matchConfig,
86  new string[] {
87  matchData.GetThinker(PColor.White).ToString(),
88  matchData.GetThinker(PColor.Red).ToString() });
89 
90  // Notify listeners that we have a new empty board
91  BoardUpdate?.Invoke(board);
92 
93  // Game loop
94  while (true)
95  {
96  // Next player plays
97  winner = Play();
98  // Break loop if a winner is found
99  if (winner != Winner.None) break;
100  }
101 
102  // Notify listeners that match is over
103  MatchOver?.Invoke(
104  winner,
105  solution,
106  new string[] {
107  matchData.GetThinker(PColor.White).ToString(),
108  matchData.GetThinker(PColor.Red).ToString() });
109 
110  // Return match result
111  return winner;
112  }
113 
115  private Winner Play()
116  {
117  // Get a reference to the current thinker
118  IThinker thinker = matchData.CurrentThinker;
119 
120  // Determine the color of the current thinker
121  PColor color = board.Turn;
122 
123  // Match result so far
124  Winner winner = Winner.None;
125 
126  // Thinking start time
127  DateTime startTime = DateTime.Now;
128 
129  // Real think time in milliseconds
130  int thinkTimeMillis;
131 
132  // Apparent thinking time left
133  int timeLeftMillis;
134 
135  // Task to execute the thinker in a separate thread
136  Task<FutureMove> thinkTask;
137 
138  // Notify listeners that next turn is about to start
139  NextTurn?.Invoke(color, thinker.ToString());
140 
141  // Ask thinker to think about its next move
142  thinkTask = Task.Run(
143  () => thinker.Think(board.Copy(), ts.Token));
144 
145  // The thinking process might throw an exception, so we wrap
146  // task waiting in a try/catch block
147  try
148  {
149  // Wait for thinker to think... until the allowed time limit
150  if (thinkTask.Wait(timeLimitMillis))
151  {
152  // Thinker successfully made a move within the time limit
153 
154  // Get the move selected by the thinker
155  FutureMove move = thinkTask.Result;
156 
157  // Was the thinker able to chose a move?
158  if (move.IsNoMove)
159  {
160  // Thinker was not able to chose a move
161 
162  // Raise an invalid play event and set the other
163  // thinker as the winner of the match
164  winner = OnInvalidPlay(
165  color, thinker,
166  "Thinker unable to perform move");
167  }
168  else
169  {
170  // Thinker was able to chose a move
171 
172  // Perform move in game board, get column where move
173  // was performed
174  int row = board.DoMove(move.shape, move.column);
175 
176  // If the column had space for the move...
177  if (row >= 0)
178  {
179  // Obtain thinking end time
180  thinkTimeMillis = (int)(DateTime.Now - startTime)
181  .TotalMilliseconds;
182 
183  // How much time left for the minimum apparent move
184  // time?
185  timeLeftMillis =
186  minMoveTimeMillis - thinkTimeMillis;
187 
188  // Was the minimum apparent move time reached
189  if (timeLeftMillis > 0)
190  {
191  // If not, wait until it is reached
192  Thread.Sleep(timeLeftMillis);
193  }
194 
195  // Notify listeners of the move performed
196  MovePerformed?.Invoke(
197  color, thinker.ToString(),
198  move, thinkTimeMillis);
199 
200  // Get possible winner and solution
201  winner = board.CheckWinner(solution);
202  }
203  else
204  {
205  // If we get here, column didn't have space for the
206  // move, which means that thinker made an invalid
207  // move and should lose the game
208 
209  // Raise an invalid play event and set the other
210  // thinker as the winner of the match
211  winner = OnInvalidPlay(
212  color, thinker,
213  "Tried to place piece in column "
214  + $"{move.column}, which is full");
215  }
216  }
217  }
218  else // Did the time limit expired?
219  {
220  // Notify thinker to voluntarily stop thinking
221  ts.Cancel();
222 
223  // Raise an invalid play event and set the other thinker
224  // as the winner of the match
225  winner = OnInvalidPlay(
226  color, thinker, "Time limit expired");
227  }
228  }
229  catch (Exception e)
230  {
231  // Is this an inner exception?
232  if (e.InnerException != null)
233  {
234  // If so, use it for error message purposes
235  e = e.InnerException;
236  }
237 
238  // Raise an invalid play event and set the other thinker as
239  // the winner of the match
240  winner = OnInvalidPlay(
241  color, thinker,
242  $"Thinker exception: '{e.Message}'");
243  }
244 
245  // Notify listeners that the board was updated
246  BoardUpdate?.Invoke(board);
247 
248  // Return winner
249  return winner;
250  }
251 
252  // Raise and invalid play event and return the match winner (which is
253  // the opponent of the thinker that made an invalid play)
254  private Winner OnInvalidPlay(
255  PColor color, IThinker thinker, string reason)
256  {
257  // Set the other thinker as the winner of the match
258  Winner winner = color.Other().ToWinner();
259 
260  // Set solution to null
261  solution = null;
262 
263  // Notify listeners that thinker made an invalid play
264  InvalidPlay?.Invoke(color, thinker.ToString(), reason);
265 
266  // Return the winner
267  return winner;
268  }
269 
272  public event Action<IMatchConfig, IList<string>> MatchStart;
273 
276  public event Action<Board> BoardUpdate;
277 
280  public event Action<PColor, string> NextTurn;
281 
284  public event Action<PColor, string, string> InvalidPlay;
285 
288  public event Action<PColor, string, FutureMove, int> MovePerformed;
289 
292  public event Action<Winner, ICollection<Pos>, IList<string>> MatchOver;
293  }
